donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

project_descr: This project provides two pronged support - 1) economic development activities for women in 4 target districts and 2) UN support to the national development plan Special efforts will be made towards promoting employment opportunities for women.
